name: Mirna N. De Jes√∫s Cambero
bio: Mirna has a decade of Software Development experience working on large projects in the areas of healthcare, telecommunications, and FinTech. Her past experiences as a Principal Software Engineer at LTSE, SOS-Developer at Orange Dominicana, and Team Lead at Telvent Global Services, has given her deep expertise in the Java Language and Software Development practices. Mirna has been recognized as a young Software Developer in the Dominican Republic on a number of occasions. By excelling as a software engineer, she aims to have a positive impact on society and inspire other women. She holds a Software Development Technologist degree from ITLA and a B.Sc. in Information Systems from UNAPEC.
